description: {"blocks":[{"key":"dapmq","text":"Filtration and extraction protocol of plankton metagenomic samples to obtain high molecular weight DNA for sequencing on Minion nanopore.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3lqa0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dg3jl","text":"The protocol describes the following steps:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9h0hj","text":"- filtration of the water on filters of different porosity","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bk8tv","text":"- Recovery and grinding of organisms","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5a66m","text":"- HMW extraction","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2obgf","text":"- Results","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"djv5r","text":"From several liters of water (fresh or sea).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fajol","text":"Cascade filtration on filters of different porosity with the help of a perilstatic pump.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ofl6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"btble","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d4vep","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"equipment","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":3214,"brand":"Spectra Field Pro","can_edit":0,"guid":"BF744D90C6C511ECB82B112A9B258529","link":null,"name":"","sku":"SFP-100","specifications":null,"type":"Perilstatic Pump","vendor":{"id":216,"name":"Waterra","link":"http://waterra.com/","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}},"file":null,"image":{"id":233844,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/hemwbjup7.jpg","name":"Spectra_Field-Pro-512x512.jpg","icon":"https://www.protocols.io/img/extensions/jpg.png"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"96m5v","text":"Filters are transferred into 5 ml tubes and flash frozen in liquid nitrogen.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f9qp1","text":"The tubes are stored at -80°C before extraction.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8fk56","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ej1gm","text":"Filters can be directly resuspended in nucléoprotect RNA  and stored at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f55oj","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fe3cq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":3043,"mol_weight":0,"name":"Liquid nitrogen","linfor":"","url":"","sku":"","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"ECA21700C6C711ECB82B112A9B258529","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":1,"name":"Contributed by users","link":"https://www.protocols.io","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/1.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/1.png"}}}},"1":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":955462,"mol_weight":0,"name":"NucleoProtect RNA","linfor":"","url":"","sku":"740400.500","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"0AC48EF0C6CA11ECB82B112A9B258529","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":376,"name":"Macherey-nagel","link":"http://www.mn-net.com/","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e272i","text":"Add 3 ml of 1X PBS to the tube with the filter.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9db4n","text":"Vortex at maximum power to loosen the organisms from the membrane.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b5bik","text":"Remove the filter with sterile forceps.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9bjr3","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1hl5q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eebq1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":false,"cas_number":"","guid":"F10FB4E0C6C811ECB82B112A9B258529","id":2123,"linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"1X PBS (Phosphate-buffered saline )","pubchem_id":"0","public":1,"rrid":"","sku":"","stats":{"total_protocols":35},"url":"","vendor":{"id":0,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":"/img/vendors/1.png"},"link":"https://www.protocols.io","name":"Contributed by users"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cj3gs","text":"Centrifuge the tube to pellet the organisms.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7et9t","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6idfk","text":"Gently remove the supernatant with a pipette.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"5000","duration":300,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"3574DCA0C6C911ECB82B112A9B258529","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":32,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3nrho","text":"If the filters have been stored in Nucleoprotect, make a second wash in 500 µl of 1X PBS (same centrifugation)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eltvv","text":"Resuspend the pellet with 800 µl of CD1 buffer (PowerSoil kit).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"opla","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"13pr1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":905301,"mol_weight":0,"name":"DNeasy PowerSoil Pro Kit (250)","linfor":"","url":"https://www.qiagen.com/no/products/discovery-and-translational-research/dna-rna-purification/dna-purification/microbial-dna/dneasy-powersoil-pro-kit/?clear=true#orderinginformation","sku":"Cat No./ID: 47014","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"D41C7150C6CA11ECB82B112A9B258529","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":25,"name":"Qiagen","link":"https://www.qiagen.com/us/products/","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"pafs","text":"Incubate 10 min at 65 °C with 300 rpm agitation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9qrl3","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":1,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7hu04","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bqpr7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"04D19EB0C6CB11ECB82B112A9B258529","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"300","start":null,"temperature":"65","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"88eqi","text":"Transfer the suspension to a powerbeads tube (PowerSoil kit).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d6nqc","text":"Vortex at maximum speed for 3 x 1 min (with 1 min pause between each grinding cycle) using the horizontal tube adapter.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a426r","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1ilfa","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ljoo","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e5cl9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ng86","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b6ks0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":180,"guid":"205AE140C6E511ECB82B112A9B258529","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"equipment","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":3215,"brand":"Horizontal Microtube Holder for 24 Tubes","can_edit":0,"guid":"CBEAB5D0C6E511ECB82B112A9B258529","link":null,"name":"","sku":"97060-178","specifications":null,"type":null,"vendor":{"id":54,"name":"Vwr","link":"https://us.vwr.com/store/","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}},"file":null,"image":{"id":234070,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/heuybjup7.jpg","name":"1ALA-01-1000Wx1000H.jpg","icon":"https://www.protocols.io/img/extensions/jpg.png"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5q6q0","text":"Transfer the grinding material by dipping the tip at the bottom of the tube into a 2ml tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7pqjm","text":"Add 200 µl of CD2 solution (stored at 4°C) to the grinding and vortex 5 sec.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fjr0f","text":"Centrifuge 1 min / 14 000 G / RT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5iuhu","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2fr20","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"14000","duration":60,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"AA6C1330C6E611ECB82B112A9B258529","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":32,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"clhi5","text":"Transfer the supernatant (avoiding touching the pellet) to a 2ml tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"691so","text":"Add 600 µl of CD3 solution and vortex 5 sec.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3n8br","text":"Load 700 µl of the lysate on a MB spin column (PowerSoil kit)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":30,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dh0h5","text":"Centrifuge 1 min / 14 000 G","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2suhc","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5ec3o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"14000","duration":60,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"F9E7D2A0C6E611ECB82B112A9B258529","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":32,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fpcdo","text":"Discard the filtrate and repeat step 13  until the lysate is consumed","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c027f","text":"Place the column on a new collection tube and add 500 µl of EA Solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b45e9","text":"Centrifuge 1 min / 14,000 G","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8dvqk","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bp9up","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"14000","duration":60,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"61816DE0C6E711ECB82B112A9B258529","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":32,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8q7pg","text":"Discard the filtrate and add 500 µl of Solution C5","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"45eh4","text":"Centrifuge 1 min / 14,000 G","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d61gc","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4s3c1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"14000","duration":60,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"79BC4790C6E711ECB82B112A9B258529","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":32,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7mssg","text":"Place the column on a new collection tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"beiqn","text":"Centrifuge for 2 min / 14 000 G","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7hse1","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b3e08","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"14000","duration":120,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"932A7120C6E711ECB82B112A9B258529","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":32,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"80f1","text":"Place the column on a 1.5 ml eppendorf tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5mn37","text":"Add 25 µl of Solution C6 to the center of the column","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"92iuu","text":"Incubate 5 min at RT and Centrifuge 1 min / 14 000 G","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ukn9","text":"    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":2,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"327s4","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c8qf0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"C70A9FB0C6E711ECB82B112A9B258529","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"CBE7BDB0C6E711ECB82B112A9B258529","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"2":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"14000","duration":60,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"D17E8EC0C6E711ECB82B112A9B258529","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":32,"unit":34}}}}
